QuestData.Title: The Rod of Compulsion
QuestData.Description: A rod drops from Alphonse's dead hand. There are pulsing magical runes along its length.$B$BCould this be how he was getting his confessions?$B$BBetter let the high executor have a look at it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Torturer's Rod to High Executor Wroth at Venomspite.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you get that rod from their torturer?
QuestData.RewardText: LeCraft had it you say? That makes sense.$B$BI recognize it from my youthful days as a torturer in the court of King Terenas of fallen Lordaeron. It's known as a rod of compulsion.$B$B<The high executor wrings his hands together in evil anticipation of what's to come.>$B$BI have an idea for how we can make good use of it!
